column5: Nestled in a historic neighborhood in the heart of the Medical Center. Across the street from the University of Texas Health Science Center. Easy access to the South Texas Medical Center, Fiesta Texas, River Walk and Sea World. Walking distance to food and services. Great mile walk within the neighborhood or walk the track across the street at the UTHSC. Surprisingly rural setting in the middle of the city. Plenty of wildlife including deer, fox, hawk and even the occasional peacock.
column8: New! Fiesta Loft/Urban Retreat Medical Center
